event_logs.description: Affiliate address in smart contract events
event_logs.results: No matches found, parsing errors present

lessons_learned.lesson: Always verify affiliate addresses are actively used before building listeners
lessons_learned.impact: Built complete system for inactive address
lessons_learned.future_action: Validate addresses through recent transaction history first

lessons_learned.lesson: Building robust infrastructure doesn't guarantee finding target data
lessons_learned.impact: System is production-ready but finds nothing
lessons_learned.future_action: Validate data availability before building full systems

lessons_learned.lesson: Start with small, focused tests before large scans
High transaction volume doesn't guarantee affiliate activity
lessons_learned.impact: Base has 200+ transactions per block, but none involve target address
lessons_learned.future_action: Distinguish between general DEX activity and specific affiliate tracking

lessons_learned.lesson: All detection methods work, but need valid target data
lessons_learned.impact: Methods are functional but no data to detect
lessons_learned.future_action: Focus on data validation before method optimization

next_steps.description: Research correct ShapeShift affiliate address on Base
tasks: Check ButterSwap documentation for affiliate system
